subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Shouldn't be an issue. Will look at this signal when the team and I are remapping the other locations. Should have the updated Deployment Plan ready for you to review by EOD tomorrow.
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJleE79JwmM.png> 


On Tue, Jun 17, 2025 at 9:58?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	What about the traffic signal at the corner of Royal Avenue and Highway 99

	 

	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 8:35 AM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	I just spoke with Jacob. He would like us to move the camera off the Lumen pole. I will explore alternate locations with the mapping team later this afternoon when we are moving all the Flock pole locations to the traffic signals. Will let you know once done.

	 

	If you have another location in mind, let me know and we will take a look.

	 

	Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJleE79JwmM.png> 

	 

	 

	On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 2:41?PM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

		**Lumen removed**

		
		

		Hey Detective

		 

		Might be best to find a new location for this camera if Lumen is going to be slow/not responsive like this throughout the process. Let me know.

		 

		Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJleE79JwmM.png> 

		 

		 

		On Mon, Jun 16, 2025 at 2:39?PM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

			Hi Laurie,

			 

			Hope your weekend went well. Any update on getting this process started with Lumen?

			 

			Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

			 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJleE79JwmM.png> 

			 

			 

			On Wed, Jun 11, 2025 at 10:28?AM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

				Hi Laurie,

				 

				Happy Wednesday. Circling up on this. Please let us know what you need from Flock in order to get the agreement process started.

				 

				Please let me know if you have any questions.

				 

				Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/safety-tech-company-launches-tool-help-law-enforcement-fight-human-trafficking?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

				 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJleE79JwmM.png> 

				 

				 

				On Sat, Jun 7, 2025 at 8:56?AM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

					Hi Laurie,

					 

					Understood. The agreement will be between Lumen & Flock Safety then. What do we need to do to get this process started?

					 

					Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/N8dQjWVQ3Zda.png> 

					 

					 

					On Thu, Jun 5, 2025 at 1:06?PM Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com > wrote:

					If the city of Eugene owns the cameras the licensing agreement will be with the City.  If the City does not own the cameras, then Flock would need a licensing agreement with CTL/Lumen.  

					 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com <http://Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com%20>  

Pronouns � She/Her

 

 

					 

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
					Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 12:59 PM
					To: Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com >
					Cc: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >; CARTER William MD <wcarter@eugene-or.gov wcarter@eugene-or.gov >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com >
					Subject: Re: City of Eugene pole attachment requests

					 

					Hi Laurie, Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started. Thank you! Matt Triana Project Manager 949-547-3560 flocksafety.?com On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:?33 PM Brown,

					Hi Laurie,

					 

					Is this agreement between Lumen and the city/PD or Lumen and Flock? Just want to clear up who needs to get this process started.

					 

					Thank you!

	
 https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sZ4j-nse$ 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



 https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/www.facebook.com/flocksafety__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sQdeQm8g$ 



 949-547-3560 <tel:949-547-3560>    flocksafety.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/flocksafety.com?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp__;!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sYWFqLoa$ 

 

					

					 

					 

					On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 2:33?PM Brown, Laurie <Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com > wrote:

					Hello,

					 

					 

					The City of Eugene has two separate requests for pole attachments. One for police-related cameras and another for installing streetlights.

					 

					As it stands, our existing attachment license does not cover these types of attachments. Therefore, we will need to execute a new addendum to our current licensing agreement to approve these attachments. To move forward, please have the person responsible for reviewing such agreements contact me. I will then provide the initial documents that Lumen requires to draft the additional agreement. 

					 

					Once the new agreement is signed, the city will need to submit applications for camera attachments to Lumen for approval. On a related note, I am already working on the streetlight applications with William Carter, who has been included in this email for coordination within the city.

					 

					Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns.    

					 



 

Laurie Brown 

Lead Technical Program Manager

Lumen Joint Use Management

tel: (253) 458-6573|  

Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com https://urldefense.com/v3/__http:/Laurie.Brownmorgan@lumen.com*20__;JQ!!CdLFVIQ!V5Y2TwZ_UaZVpeD-gwRBF0CeKemkNiAuunvUnl28937kEnoA0lio51Va6Gq6RStlPGKTYppjrQNQD0fi1Hdi4YR5sVy5muXf$  

Pronouns � She/Her

					Sent: Wednesday, June 4, 2025 1:44 PM
					To: Rasmussen, Tobin <Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com Tobin.Rasmussen@lumen.com >

					Subject: Re: Fw: Flock camera

					 

					Hi Laurie & Team, Circling up this joint use agreement/permitting process for the Lumen pole we are proposing a camera on. Has movement with EPD started outside of this email chain or are we still waiting on that? Please let us know what

					Hi Laurie & Team,

					 

					Circling up this joint use agreement/permitting process for the Lumen pole we are proposing a camera on. Has movement with EPD started outside of this email chain or are we still waiting on that? Please let us know what we can do to help move this process along more efficiently.

					 

					Regards
